TopicTitle: Final Frontier going to be ported over or something similar in the new structure?

Articles.Content:
I for one enjoy(ed) getting all my little green people to have various ribbons and to get them various awards based on their own accomplishments. I was thinking of attempting it but I realized that 1) I don't know where to start and 2) I wouldn't know how to code it or which things to look for to make it ever come close to functioning properly.

Even for simple things like basic pilot wings for successfully taking off and landing in an aircraft without crashing/dying 5 times; or getting advanced wings when you do it 10, 15, 20 times. Not counting wings or rocket badges for successfully launching/riding a rocket up and returning from the launch. Landing on the various objects out there or even better making orbits or ribbons for fast times to orbit...seems like it would be easier for someone with a little more code ability in their brain than mine.
See here.
